product_name: Columbia Mini Pixel Grabber II Jacket - Toddler Girls'
long_description: Help your little girl see the bright side of winter in the vibrant, head-turning Columbia Mini Pixel Grabber II Jacket for toddlers. Polyester exterior shell uses an Omni-Shield(R) barrier to resist light rain and stains. Soft polyester jersey lining with Omni-Wick(TM) technology helps keep kids dry and comfortable by moving moisture away from the body for quick evaporation. Columbia Mini Pixel Grabber II Jacket features front handwarmer pockets.
short_description: Help your little girl see the bright side of winter in the vibrant, head-turning Columbia Mini Pixel Grabber II Jacket for toddlers.
